sentences.cn: the Sea Life Centre is &B{just a stone's throw from} the sea itself。

sentences.en: ...cherry stones.
sentences.cn: …樱桃核。

sentences.en: A flight of stone steps leads to the terrace.
sentences.cn: 一段石阶通向露台。

sentences.en: a stone wall
sentences.cn: 石墙

sentences.en: anything can change—nothing is written in stone.
sentences.cn: 任何事都可改变，没有什么是一成不变的。

sentences.en: Europe's biggest Stone Age earthworks are at Silbury Hill in Wiltshire.
sentences.cn: 欧洲石器时期最大的土木防御工事位于威尔特郡的西尔布利山。

sentences.en: He could not tell whether the floor was wood or stone.
sentences.cn: 他无法确定地板是木头的还是石头的。

sentences.en: He lost two stone in weight during his time there.
sentences.cn: 他在那儿的时候体重下降了2英石。

sentences.en: He was praised in print and memorialized in stone throughout the South.
sentences.cn: 在整个南方地区，他被人们著书称颂，刻碑纪念。

sentences.en: Hillsden took a sip of tea, but it was stone cold.
sentences.cn: 希尔斯登啜了一口茶，但茶是冰冷的。

sentences.en: I waved goodbye and went down the stone harbour steps.
sentences.cn: 我挥手告别，然后走下港口石阶。

sentences.en: Just a stone's throw away is the City Art Gallery.
sentences.cn: 不远处就是市美术馆。

sentences.en: She strove to read the name on the stone pillar.
sentences.cn: 她费劲地读着石柱上的名字。

sentences.en: Someone had hollowed out a large block of stone.
sentences.cn: 有人把一大块石头给凿空了。

sentences.en: Stone began to be used as a roofing material.
sentences.cn: 石料开始被用作盖屋顶的材料。

sentences.en: stone steps
sentences.cn: 石台阶

sentences.en: The floors are made of stone.
sentences.cn: 地面是石头铺成的。

sentences.en: The old stone cattle trough still sits by the main entrance.
sentences.cn: 陈旧的石制牛食槽仍然放在大门口。

sentences.en: The olives are crushed to a pulp by stone rollers.
sentences.cn: 橄榄被石磙碾成了酱。

sentences.en: Then stone the fruit and process the plums to a puree.
sentences.cn: 然后去核再将李子加工成糊状。

sentences.en: Wilde fell and struck his head on the stone floor.
sentences.cn: 怀尔德摔倒了，头撞在石头地上。

words.tran_cn: 除去核的；有核的；醉酒的
碎石机；看似吸了很多毒品的人
向…扔石头（stone的过去式和过去分词）

phrases.phrase: be written (或 engraved, set) in stone

phrases.tran_cn: ［用来强调一个潜在的批评者并不是无可非议的］率先责难
天然石；天然石材；天然宝石
不定居的人；无固定职业者
一块石头一块石头地；一点一滴地
(英，非正式)［用作表示惊讶或吃惊的感叹］哎呀！啊
斯通山（美国佐治亚州西北部山）

trans.tran_cn: 石头，宝石，矿石，（膀胱或肾脏中的）结石
trans.tran_en: the large hard part at the centre of some fruits, such as a peach or cherry, which contains the seed
to throw stones at someone or something

trans.tran_cn: 向扔石块，用石头铺，以石掷向，除（水果的）硬核
